response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties. Given its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This exceptional deal is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to this product. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1250000}
